attribute.description: Indicates the status of the button. Default: default. Options: default, primary, danger, info, success
attribute.name: state

attribute.description: Indicates the type of button. Default: button. Options: button, submit
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: Indicates the component linked to dismiss button. Default false. Options: true,false
attribute.name: dismiss

attribute.description: Indicates the if button is full filled. Default false. Options: true,false
attribute.name: filled

attribute.description: It indicates a CSS class to the component
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Indicates the url to be performed by the component
attribute.name: url

attribute.description: Indicates the icon to be used by the component. available list https://fontawesome.com/icons
attribute.name: icon

attribute.description: Indicates the component target. Default: _self. Options: _blank, _newtab, _parent, nomedoiframe
attribute.name: target

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered. Default : true
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be blocked after click . Default : false
attribute.name: autoblock

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be disabled. Default: false.
attribute.name: disabled

tag.name: button-group
tag.example: <html:button-group> <html:button label="My button 1" icon="search" id="btn1" /> <html:button label="My button 2" icon="plus" state="danger" filled="true" /> </html:button-group>
